      • getSortedUserLanguages

        public static java.util.List<TrnLocale> getSortedUserLanguages(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                        throws DgException
        Returns sorted and translated user languages for the given site. This list is formed using using language inheritance business logic (see DiGi Multilangual document for more details)
        Parameters:
        site -
        Returns:
        sorted languages
        Throws:
        DgException

      • sortByTranslation

        public static java.util.List sortByTranslation(java.util.Collection source,
                                               Locale locale,
                                               TranslationCallback callback,
                                               boolean groupTranslation)
                                        throws DgException
        Returns list of query results sorted according translated sitenames. If there is no appropreate resource for one of the sitenames, sorting will process according default sitename.
        Parameters:
        source - Collection of query results
        locale - Selected locale for translation
        callback - TranslationCallback implementation, which defines how to use query result item
        groupTranslation -

        When true sorting is proceeded according to root translations if local translations are null

        When false sorting is proceeded according to local translations only.

        In both cases, when local or root translations are null sorting is proceeded according default sitename

        Returns:
        new sorted List, compatible with source collection
        Throws:
        DgException

      • getLuceneModules

        public static java.util.List<LucModule<?>> getLuceneModules()
        Returns modules for all supported languages including English.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        LangSupport

      • getMessagesForKeys

        public static java.util.List<Message> getMessagesForKeys(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> keys)
                                                  throws DgException
        Returns messages for specified set of keys. This is used when we need to load translations only by keys not looking at site_id and language.
        Parameters:
        keys - set of keys to search fore.
        Returns:
        list of found Message beans.
        Throws:
        DgException

      • getMessagesForLocales

                                                            boolean exclude)
                                                     throws DgException
        Returns all messages of specified locale code.
        Parameters:
        locales - set of locale codes like en, fr, es
        Returns:
        list of Message beans - translations.
        Throws:
        DgException

      • groupByKey

        public static java.util.Collection<MessageGroup> groupByKey(java.util.Collection<Message> messages)
                                                     throws DgException
        Groups messages with key field in MessageGroup beans.
        Parameters:
        messages -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DgException

      • groupByKey

        public static <E extends MessageGroup> java.util.Collection<E> groupByKey(java.util.Collection<Message> messages,
                                                                          TrnUtil.MessageGroupFactory<E> factory)
                                                                   throws DgException
        Groups messages with key field and r
        Type Parameters:
        E - any subclass of MessageGroup
        Parameters:
        messages - collection of messages.
        factory - concrete message group factory.
        Returns:
        collection of message group beans. Each of them will contain messages with same key.
        Throws:
        DgException

      • groupByKey

        public static <E extends MessageGroup> java.util.Collection<E> groupByKey(java.util.Collection<Message> messages,
                                                                          TrnUtil.MessageGroupFactory<E> factory,
                                                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> scoresByKey)
                                                                   throws DgException
        Groups translations by keys, also sets scores for the groups. Scores are some values used for sorting translations, e.g. lucene hit scores. Which type of message group beans should be created is defined by factory parameter.
        Type Parameters:
        E - MessageGroup or any its offspring.
        Parameters:
        messages - collection of messages which should be grouped by keys.
        factory - factory for creating message group beans.
        scoresByKey - map of scores by keys.
        Returns:
        list of message group beans.
        Throws:
        DgException

      • removeDuplicateHashCodes

        public static <E extends MessageGroup> java.util.Collection<E> removeDuplicateHashCodes(java.util.Collection<E> groups)
        Merges groups messages with same hash code key resulting in no duplicates. Used only during patching old translations using PatcherMessageGroup, with normal MessageGroup will not have any effect.
        Type Parameters:
        E -
        Parameters:
        groups -
        Returns:
